Package client

Class Handler

java.lang.Object
client.Handler
public class Handler extends Object
The Handler class uses the singleton pattern and it is the center for all the common operations and variables. It will be shared across every class. Its methods must be synchronized
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

    • setNewServerAddress

      public static void setNewServerAddress(InetAddress address, short port)
      To set the new server address and port. It is required to call the connect() method
      Parameters:
      address - A valid server address
      port - The server's port
